survey_name: Smartphone Camera Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand user satisfaction and behavior patterns related to smartphone camera usage for photography and videography.

questions.question_text: How often do you use your smartphone camera for photography or videography?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for frequency to capture granularity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.
